summary: Frontend-only testing of MistakeMastery UX fixes: Habit Progress spacing and clickable move preview functionality. All 7 features tested and verified working correctly.

habit_progress_spacing.details: Habit Progress section uses gap-4 class and whitespace-nowrap to prevent text breaking
habit_progress_spacing.verified: Container has classes 'flex items-center justify-between text-sm gap-4' with whitespace-nowrap spans

preview_buttons_on_move_options.details: Both move options (Be2 and Bg6) have Preview buttons visible in question phase
preview_buttons_on_move_options.verified: Found 2 Preview buttons, each move option card has 'Preview' button

clicking_preview_plays_line.details: Clicking Preview button plays the move's line on the board
clicking_preview_plays_line.verified: Playback indicator shows 'Better line: Move 1/5' or 'After your move: Move X/Y'

step_controls_appear.details: Step controls (SkipBack, ChevronLeft, Play/Pause, ChevronRight, SkipForward) appear when a line is being played
step_controls_appear.verified: All 6 control buttons appear: lucide-skip-back, lucide-chevron-left, Play/Pause, lucide-chevron-right, lucide-skip-forward, Reset

step_through_line_manually.details: User can navigate through line using arrow buttons
step_through_line_manually.verified: Tested step forward, step backward, skip to end, skip to start - all functional

reset_button_clears_playback.details: Reset button clears the playback and returns to original position
reset_button_clears_playback.verified: Clicking Reset clears step controls and resets board

feedback_phase_clickable_line_cards.details: Feedback phase shows clickable line cards that play the variation when clicked
feedback_phase_clickable_line_cards.verified: Found 2 line cards as <button> elements with 'Click to play' hints. Clicking plays variation on board with step controls

critical_code_review_comments: MistakeMastery.jsx line 434-445: Habit Progress section correctly uses gap-4 and whitespace-nowrap classes
MistakeMastery.jsx line 542-574: Move options with Preview buttons implemented correctly - each option is a card with number badge, move text, and Preview button
MistakeMastery.jsx line 469-528: Step controls (SkipBack, ChevronLeft, Play/Pause, ChevronRight, SkipForward, Reset) render conditionally when playbackPositions.length > 0
MistakeMastery.jsx line 601-628: Feedback phase line cards are clickable <button> elements that call playMovesOnBoard() with threat_line or better_line
context_for_next_testing_agent: MistakeMastery component UX features verified: (1) Habit Progress has proper spacing with gap-4 and whitespace-nowrap, (2) Both move options have Preview buttons in question phase, (3) Clicking Preview plays the line on board with step controls, (4) Step controls (SkipBack, ChevronLeft, Play/Pause, ChevronRight, SkipForward, Reset) work correctly, (5) Reset clears playback, (6) Feedback phase has clickable line cards that play variations. All features working as expected.
